duties_responsibilities.duty: Install, maintain, and repair HVAC systems using refrigeration theory, electrical schematics, and mechanical layouts.
Perform timely preventative maintenance, site surveys, replacement, and modifications.
Repair, overhaul, and start-ups of commercial HVAC systems.
Provide technical support and act as a resource for customers.
Inspect, maintain, and repair all company-provided materials including fleet vehicle, tools, and equipment.
Ensure compliance with federal, state, and local laws, legal regulations, and recommended best practices.
Collaborate with all Associates to uphold the company's mission and values.

education_certification.credential: Associate's degree, certificate, or military training in Heating, Ventilation and Air Conditioning from an accredited institution
